body.name: CANIVI Under Sink Mat, 34" x 22" Waterproof Silicone Under Sink Tray for Kitchen & Laundry Cabinets, Kitchen Cabinet Shelf Protector, Up to 3.3 Gallons Liquid, Fits 36 inch Standard Cabinet (Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 49 mins
features: EXCELLENT PROTECTION - L x 22" = kitchen cabinets. CANIVI under sink mat designed to protect your cabinets, shelves, and floors from damage caused by plumbing leaks, stains, scratches, product or chemical spills, and more. CANIVI under sink Tray can hold up to 3.3 gallons of liquid in the event of a leak or product spill. Our mats have a multipurpose function as a drip tray, under sink cabinet mat, and a shelf liner.

EASY TO CLEAN & INSTALL - CANIVI under sink Mats are easy to install and can be removed quickly for clean-up. Our under sink drip tray are the perfect solution for messy, dirty, or disorganized kitchen and laundry cabinets; This can help keep your cleaning supplies, toiletries, and other items organized and easily accessible. Plus, our kitchen cabinet tray can be easily wiped clean with a damp cloth.

FLEXIBLE & WATERPROOF DESIGN - Our waterproof, silicone mats allow for flexibility and durability. CANIVI waterproof Mats feature raised, angled side walls and a textured surface to ensure a snug fit while keeping stored items from getting wet in the event of a leak. Well enough support gallons of water, making it more convenient to use.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL USE: This waterproof mat can be used not only for kitchen and laundry cabinets, but also can be used bathroom vanities, potted plants, dish rack mats, pet feeding mats, craft mats and work mats, a versatile solution for organization and protection in various areas of your home. Cabinet liners are also ideal for gifts.

CABINET PARTNER: The size of the under sink mat is 34x22 inches. The height of the silicone pad is 0.79 inches. Please check for plumbing coming through the bottom of your cabinet before ordering. Measure the inside of your cabinet. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us via "Canivi Direct" (under the buy now button).

reviews.reviewText: Fits standard kitchen under the sink perfectly and is just what you need to protect the finish of your cabinet. Good price and does the job. Has a very flexible lip around the outside edge to protect against spills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little floppy on the edges, but not bad.
reviews.reviewText: I got this because the area under the sink had (actually, still HAS if you look carefully at the pictures) a thin plastic sheet to protect the wood. My landlady put it there, and I think it's done an OK job, but there have been times where water ended up pooling enough down there that it was a problem. I wanted something that would contain a bit more water without having it soak into the wood (and damage it, obviously), and I thought this would do the trick. I haven't loaded it up with water, but I can tell it's not going to hold a whole lot. Obviously I wouldn't want this thing trying to contain water all the way up to the top of the walls on it, but... I think it's fine for what it does.Also: The material is smooth, but has a bit of grip to it, so it's not just going to slide around. I actually used it on the counter next to the sink for a couple of weeks because I was too lazy to get all the stuff out from under the sink so I could put it down there. It's pretty nice! I actually might get another one just for that exact purpose. It was really handy to have there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks, fits & works great!
reviews.reviewText: I love this mat so much more than I probably should love a silicone mat. I thought it would be little small for under my kitchen sink but it fits perfectly (so I must have measured incorrectly). It feels thick & fairly heavy duty but very flexible & not too heavy. I love the high lips to contain any liquid. I also like the dark color to hide any dirt or potential future stains from cleaning chemicals (even though I highly doubt that this material would ever stain - I'll update in the future if there is anything to report but I think any spill would be easily wiped up & leave no trace). It definitely has a non-slip texture that keeps anything from moving. It was actually a little tricky getting my organizational stuff back under the sink & into place because it wouldn't slide at all and kept trying to grab the lip. I have zero concerns about anything leaking or spilling under there now - I know that it will stay contained and it'll be a lot easier to clean up. Everyone should have one of these bad boys under all of their sinks! I highly recommend!
